name: gnotifier
author: Michal Kosciesza <michal@mkiol.net>
description: GNotifier integrates Firefox's notifications with the native notification system from Linux/OSX desktop. It supports: GNOME, KDE, Xfce, Cinnamon, MATE, LXDE and Unity

preferences.name: downloadCompleteAlert
preferences.title: Download Complete notification
preferences.description: 'Downloads Complete' notification will be shown everytime when Firefox is finished downloading.

preferences.name: notifyIcon
preferences.title: Notification Icon
preferences.description: Defines Icon used in notifications. For example: 'firefox', 'web-browser' or 'iceweasel'. If value is set to 'default' then icon will be set based on system name.

preferences.name: replaceAlerts
preferences.title: Replace alerts service (needs restart)
preferences.description: Replaces Firefox's built-in notification engine. It has impact on Web Notifications API and notifications from Social Services.
